          <title>
            <string language="en">Path of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pfad des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voie d'accès de lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trajeto da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Percorso di luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μονοπάτι του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Camino de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the incorrect way of drawing the path of light from the light bulb to the mirror to the eye.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light path</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">scholastic assessment test</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">science sat</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die falsche Methode des 
Zeichnens des Pfades des Lichtes von der Glühlampe zum Spiegel zum 
Auge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la voie incorrecte de 
tirer la voie d'accès de la lumière de l'ampoule au miroir à 
l'oeil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a maneira incorreta de 
desenhar o trajeto da luz do bulbo claro ao espelho ao olho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il modo errato di 
estrarre il percorso di luce dalla lampadina allo specchio all'occhio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ανακριβή τρόπο το 
μονοπάτι του φωτός από τον ελαφρύ βολβό στον καθρέφτη στο μάτι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la manera incorrecta de
trazar el camino de la luz de la bombilla al espejo al ojo.</string>
          </description>
